channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260123.3)
item.description:
What's New

fix: Early return for keyUp events to fix Adobe spring-loaded tools

  • Add immediate pass-through for keyUp events in EventTapManager
  • Fixes issue where mouse stays in drag state after releasing Z/Space

keys in Adobe Illustrator/Photoshop on low-RAM (8GB) machines

  • Spring-loaded tools require precise keyUp timing; event tap's

processing delay was causing keyUp to arrive too late

  • Safe because XKey only processes keyDown for Vietnamese input

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
